import numpy as np

def calculate_total_bar_area(data):
    areas = np.prod(data[:, :, 1, :] + data[:, :, 0, :], axis=2)
    total_area = np.sum(areas)
    return total_area

import numpy as np

    areas = np.prod(data[:, :, 1, :] * data[:, :, 0, :], axis=2)
    total_area = np.sum(areas)
    return total_area
